description:
Looking for a productive lifestyle property? If you answered yes! This is one for you
Beautifully presented 4 Bedroom 2 Bathroom home with well appointed kitchen/meals area, separate lounge, main bedroom with ensuite, set in superb garden with established trees. 3KW high efficiency Solar System. Seperate 2 car lockup garage & carport, along with a magnificent 3 Bay Colour bond American Barn, fully enclosed with concrete flooring throughout. Frontage to a major road, would lend itself for anyone wishing to promote a small stud, business etc. Located just 7 Km from Cobram, this property comprises 42 acres of which 30 has been lasered, with top quality irrigation infrastructure with large outlets. Is fully recycled to a large 2mg dam equipped with motor & pump, with access to drainage. The property is cyclone fenced into 12 separate tree lined paddocks, with flexibility of sheep & cattle yards & crush, which makes this property easy to manage. S&D bore to house Garden & troughs, 4 rain water tanks: G.M.W Delivery entitlements. 10 acres of redgum bushland at the rear of the property, along with yabby dam, provides an ideal setting that can be enjoyed by the whole family. A property with the option of production andor lifestyle close to the Murray River.

LOOKING FOR ROOM
This private 5 B/R Brick Home has been partly refurbished and is located in the North end of Cobram. This well built home has large Living Areas, Kitchen with new gas cooking, plenty of cupboards, spacious Dining, 2 Bathrooms, ducted cooling and an outdoor entertaining area. With this good design you have plenty of access to the rear yard for boats or caravans and a good size shed and double lock up garage at the front.
You’ll love it. Phone today.

OASIS VILLAGE
• Quality 3 Bedroom Home
• Good size Living areas, ducted air-conditioning, gas heating
• Carport area, 2 garden sheds, neat & tidy gardens
• Ideal opportunity, a superb Retirement Home Park, quality facilities

QUALITY TOWNHOUSE
Well designed 2 bedroom brick veneer Townhouse with 2 bathrooms. This home offers open living plan, single lock up garage, walking distance to shops, schools and hospital. Quality fixtures and fitting plus split system air conditioning. At this price youll find it very hard to resist, so be sure to call for an appointment to inspect. Phone 5872 1255.

Ideal Investment Opportunity
Neat three bedroom home. Well appointed kitchen with gas hotplates. All bedrooms with BIR's. Ducted refrigerated cooling to all rooms. Paved undercover entertaining area. Secured yard with tidy garden. Small garden shed with power. The perfect investment with nothing to spend. Currently let at $210 per week.
Vendor keen to sell ~ All Offers Considered!
Property Code: 403901744

address: 20 Andre Street, Green Palms Village Cobram VIC 3644
description:
Retirement Gem "Greens Palms Village"
This luxury and spacious as new residence has so much to offer and would suit the most fastidious buyer. Features beautifully appointed large kitchen with excellent storage, bench space and quality appliances. Spacious living area with sliding doors opening to entertaining deck. Separate lounge with feature bay window and generous bedrooms. Main with walk in robe and ensuite. Timber floating floors, quality fixtures and fittings, reverse cycle split system air conditioner. Fantastic outdoor entertaining area with built in bar, BBQ and lockup workshop. The perfect retirement house that is sure to impress.
Inspect Today.
Property Code: 403901953

Ready to Go!
This neat and tidy three bedroom family home is looking for a new owner. Well maintained, and with an updated kitchen and bathroom, this home has many appealing features.
* Updated kitchen with adjoining meals area.
* Separate lounge with natural gas, burning log fire and air conditioner.
* Three bedrooms, all with built in robes.
* Bathroom includes bath and separate shower recess.
* Continuous gas hot water service.
* Single carport.
* Outside awnings.
* Two garden sheds.
* Neat, well fenced yard.
Would suit a first home buyer, or be a great investment property with nothing needing to be done - tenants are waiting for this quality of home! Rent would be in the $ 210 to $ 240 per week range.
Property Code: 403901699

Cosy Family Home!
Well presented family home with practical floor plan and in an excellent location. Open plan kitchen/meals/family room with cosy solid fuel heater. Separate formal lounge and separate study. Three good sized bedrooms, all with built in robes and main with ensuite. Refrigerated heating/cooling. Covered outdoor BBQ area with ceiling fan. Neat yard with sprinkler system. Garden shed plus single garage/workshop with concrete floor and power. Large double carport at front and side access to yard available.
Call now to arrange an inspection!
Property Code: 403901241

Rare Cobram Select Acreage 6074 Sq m - Dream Home Block on Edge of Town with Existing Huge 12m x 18m Shed for all the Boy Things.
Picturesque level acreage block of 6,074 sq.m (1 1/2 acres) fronting a private gravel asphalt private road off 19/20 Catona Crescent, Cobram. About 1 km from Safeways. Good walking distance. On edge of town.
Blocks like this are rare in Cobram, and sought after.
Large nearly new approx. 4 years old Colorbond shed, size 12 m wide x 18 m long. 2 x drive through roller doors. Roller door's clearance is 2.9 m high or 9' 6 1/2". Roof skylights. 216 sq. m concrete steel troweled floor area. Would suit tradies, horse pony enthusiasts, boat, caravans, boats...room for all the boy's toys.
Large wood fire heater, TV aerial, HWS, kitchenette and shower/basin in partitioned off area of shed. Ready for connection to future sewerage treatment unit.
Underground power to electrical switch box at future house location.
Underground power to shed switch sub-board, with plenty of lighting and many double power outlets.
Telephone cabling from street pit to electrical house power box and to shed.
Town water connected. 4 x 12 mm tap outlets around the block off 20 mm pipes.
Gas lines at boundary to gas meter at Catona Crescent.
All boundary perimeters have rural horizontal wire fencing on star pickets.
Red tipped Photinia Robusta approximately 2.5 metre high growing hedge to 3 boundaries for full privacy screening.
Front boundary planted with 13 x Golden Ash trees
Numurous Cleveland Pears to driveways.
Three rail fence pony paddock.
8 m approx x 17 m approx rabbit proofed fenced veggie garden with gravel pathways. Raised beds.
Small compact orchid with pears, apples, cherries, nectarines, apricot, fig, lemon, orange, plum, pomegranate and peach.
6 different white and red grape vines to veggie garden fence.
All trees, orchid and veggie garden irrigated by electronic timers.
15,000 litre rainwater tank with electric auto pressure pump. Tank has 50 mm Fire Hose connection. Tank on concrete hardstand platform,
Blue metal graded gravel driveways and hardstand around shed area.
Section 32 details available in solicitor's Vendor Statement.
Geotechnical report available for new house.
Plans can be obtained as approved on expired building permit for 3 bedroom house from designer and council on application. See photo attached.
Plan of Subdivision PS 605058V Lot 2, See Plan of Subdivision in photos. See plan of subdivision in photos...
The Vendors are flexible with a settlement period , and may provide some Vendor limited finance to a Purchaser with discussion...
For personal inspection, please contact agent.

2 Acre ~ Cobram Oasis
Spacious four bedroom family residence in a fantastic location offering in town rural living. Features appealing Blackwood kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances. Tiled meals area, large tiled family room and large separate lounge. All bedrooms with built in robes, main with walk in robe, ensuite with spa. Ducted gas heating, ducted evap cooling, direct house access from large lockup garage. Extensive outdoor entertaining area, large carport, 12m x 6m lockup shed, ideal for the tradesman. well established surrounds, domestic bore and town water.
A quality property with lots to offer for the price.
Property Code: 403901019

THIS WILL SPOIL YOU
• Like New 4B/R Brick Veneer Home
• Excellent size home – 2 Living areas, very open Kitchen/Dining/Family Room, separate Formal lounge
• Ducted Heating and Cooling
• Double lock-up Garage with access down the side for Caravan or Boat
• Good size rear yard with garden shedding
• Wonderful street appeal
• Outdoor entertaining area
• Quality Kitchen appliances with W/I Pantry
• A must to inspect, owners ready to move

Magnificent Murray River Bushland Frontage
Image This View Every Day
Brilliant location & overlooking the Murray River Bushland & Quinn Island. Short walk to Thompsons Beach & the Murray River. The block measures 881 M2, fully serviced & fence on 2 sides.
This is the spot for your dream home. The vendor is motivated to sell & the property is surplus to his requirements.
Property Code: 314

Fantastic Central Location
Set on 796m2 site only 2 blocks from the main Cobram shopping centre, this home is ideal for the first home buyer or investor. Tastefully renovated throughout with feature cathedral timber ceilings with exposed beams (in part) timber & dado walls in most other rooms, spacious lounge room with study gallery, dishwasher, elec stove & rangehood in kitchen, 3 bedrooms (2 with bay windows) Coonara heater & ducted evap air conditioning. Covered out doors BBQ area overlooking beautifully maintained gardens & trees.
Owners instructions are to sell.
Property Code: 400

Suit First Home Buyer - River End of Town
Great location in older well established area in Cobram. The block measures 1000m2, the home features rooms of generous proportions with formal lounge room, sep family area off kitchen, 3 bedrooms with BIRs in 2, renovated bathroom, air conditioning & S/C heating.
Double lockup garage, garden shed & fencing 3 sides.
Great value for money & must be sold
Property Code: 364

Great Central Location
Ideal First Home or Investment. Situated in a quiet avenue within walking distance of shops, schools & hospitals the home offers 3 bedrooms with BIRs, new kitchen with plenty of cupboard space, St George elec stove & 1&1/2 bowl sink, separate lounge room. Carpets & polished floor boards throughout. R/C air condit heating & cooling. North facing rear patio/BBQ area, fence read yard, ideal for the dogs & double carport.
Currently tenanted showing good returns to the owner.
Property Code: 419

TOP OF THE RANGE
One of the nicest “family atmosphere” homes you’re likely to see. This home features four bedrooms plus study, two perfectly portioned living areas, well appointed kitchen with all modern appliances, two bathrooms, newly constructed shedding with lane-way access, ducted heating and cooling and a wonderfully presented outdoor entertaining area. And there is more but you have to come and inspect to capture everything. Phone 5872 1255, 7 days.

CHARACTER GALORE
Ideal central location this three bedroom weatherboard home is positioned on a quality acre block. This home has been beautifully renovated throughout and offers a separate lounge, dining, quality kitchen, ducted gas heating, ducted air conditioning and a superb family / entertaining room at the rear. This home will not disappoint it has got everything you would be looking for in a home. Phone 5872 1255, 7 days.

Immaculate Family Home with Quality Renovations
Brick veneer home with stunning new kitchen incorporating quality appliances, an abundance of cupboards, drawers & under-cupboard lighting. Large dining area with sliding door access to undercover outdoor entertaining area. Three bedrooms, all with built in robes & ceiling fans. ducted evap cooling & ducted gas heating. Solar panels with back-to-grid feed. Double carport, single garage, caravan port & two garden sheds. Beautiful garden setting with established trees. Fully automatic sprinkler system.
Property Code: 403901703

PRIME ELEVATED HOMESITE
Excellent new home site in highly sought after location in new river-end estate. Elevated sandy rise, 800 square metre block and surrounded by quality new homes. Generous 17.29 metre frontage, close to parkland and Murray River. Build your dream home and enjoy all the benefits this prime location has to offer.
Property Code: 403901646

Prime Location!
Three bedroom weatherboard home set on a spacious block in a convenient location. Features include all electric kitchen, built in robes to all bedrooms, family bathroom with shower, vanity and toilet. Reverse cycle heating and cooling, secure lock up backyard with shed. No more than a 5 minute walk to the schools and the town centre. Arrange your inspection now !
Property Code: 403901364

PERFECT START OR INVESTMENT
Invest or nest in this lovely home, located close to town facilities. Features include: the kitchen boasting ample bench and cupboard space, adjacent meals area, central bathroom and a sizable laundry with plenty of storage, making it a breeze to keep tidy. Three bedrooms, 2 with BIR, evaporative cooling and a beautiful gas heater in the lounge with ducts throughout to give year round comfort. Side yard access allows room for the caravan and a large lock up shed with concrete flooring and power.
